title: Rime

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything, they gain an Ice Mark and you learn their name.
- Roleblock immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player with an Ice Mark each night and name a number X. They permanently lose their Xth ability. If they don't have X abilities, they don't lose anything and you'll be notified.
**Frozen Form** â€” Use any number of abilities that you've caused players to lose. You may only use this ability once each game.
